Send Me Local Membership Information
Membership Info
We have an array ofmembership plans tailored to fit your unique boating needs. No matter where your home club resides, we have a membership option suited to your lifestyle.
ALL MEMBERSHIPS INCLUDE:
Comprehensive new member orientation
Free & unlimited training by certified captains
Concierge-level dockside service & support
Access to a diverse premium fleet of name brand boats
Zero maintenance boating – we handle the cleaning, repairs, insurance and beyond
Member events and special programs
Ease and convenience – arrive at the docks and your reserved boat will be fueled up and ready to go
CHOOSE A PLAN
Discover our membership tiers, carefully crafted to suit your unique boating needs. Check out our two most popular membership plans below or
connect with a representative from your preferred club market
to find a plan that is right for you.
Weekday Plan
Experience unrivaled weekday access to our diverse fleet of boats all season long.
Typically Includes:
All standard membership benefits mentioned above
Weekday reciprocal access to 400+ prime locations around the world
4 active reservations at a time
2 captains per household
Request Pricing
Freedom Boating Plan
Enjoy unlimited access to our diverse fleet of boats any day of the week, all season long.
Typically Includes:
All standard membership benefits mentioned above
Weekday + weekend reciprocal access to 400+ prime locations around the world
4 active reservations at a time
2 captains per household
Request Pricing
Hero Component HTML starts here
×
Hero Component HTML ends here
Zero Maintenance
Each location provides you with a fleet of boats that come with less stress and a lower price tag than owning a single boat. We clean, maintain, store, and do all the prep work while you spend your time having fun on the water.
Unlimited Training
Every member experiences our award-winning new member orientation and training program led by certified captains to ensure you're knowledgeable, safe, and confident behind the helm.
Reciprocal Access
When you join one club, you join them all! Members enjoy unlimited access to the fleet at their home club and reciprocal access to 400+ additional locations across North America, Europe, and Australia.
Get Started
Our local executives are here to guide you through the membership opportunities in your area and help find the right one for you. Complete the form below to join 90,000+ Freedom Boat Club members and experience how simple boating can really be.
Contact Us Today For More Information!
If you’d like to know more about Freedom Boat Club or have specific questions about what we have to offer, please complete and submit the form. One of our friendly Freedom Boat Club representatives will be happy to respond and provide all of the answers you need. If you would rather speak with someone directly, please call toll free (1.888.781.7363) and we will be happy to connect you with a representative from your preferred club market.
All fields required

Send Me Local Membership Information
About Us
It’s more than a boat club… It’s Freedom.
Established in 1989 in Sarasota, FL, Freedom Boat Club is the largest boat club in the world. Our founding vision was clear: to provide a hassle-free boating experience for our members.
In a time when traditional boat ownership dominated the industry, our club model was revolutionary. With no boat clubs or extensive rental options available, we opened the waterways to the shared boat access revolution with premium dockside service and unparalleled training opportunities.
In May of 2019, Freedom Boat Club was acquired by Brunswick Corporation, joining the likes of Mercury Marine engines and boat brands including Bayliner Boats, Boston Whaler, Lund, and Sea Ray among several others – further solidifying our position as a market leader in the marine industry.
We’ve challenged the boating status quo for over 35 years. Today, we operate 400+ locations, offering 90,000+ members access to thousands of premium boats in waterways around the world.
Join Freedom Boat Club today and discover the joy of boating without the hassle.

John Giglio
Executive Director - Strategic Initiatives
John Giglio
, the former president & CEO of Freedom Boat Club, today serves as a executive director focused on a number of strategic initiatives for Freedom Boat Club.
A business graduate of Florida Southern College with an MBA from the University of South Florida, John was part owner of a 20-chain auto body repair firm prior to joining Freedom Boat Club in 2004 as operations manager for its corporate-owned stores, a post he held for three years. He was promoted to sales manager, and within six months, was named director of sales and operations. He and his former partner purchased the company in 2011 and John was named president of Freedom Boat Club LLC. Just a little more than a year later, in May 2012, he bought out his partner and became president and CEO, with direct responsibility for all franchise and corporate operations. He maintained this role until the end of 2020 when he transitioned into his current role with the company.
Cecil Cohn
President
Cecil Cohn
is our President in Mettawa, Illinois and has been since October 2020. Mr. Cohn previously served as our Chairman in Mettawa, Illinois, from May 2019 until October 2020. In Mr. Cohn’s current capacity as President, Boating Services at Brunswick Corporation in Mettawa, Illinois, he also serves as President for Freedom Outdoor Delaware, LLC, Freedom Boat Club, LLC and Freedom Marine Sales, LLC, in Mettawa, Illinois and has done so since October 2020. Previously, Mr. Cohn served as Chairman of those same entities from May 2019 until October 2020. Mr. Cohn joined Brunswick Corporation in July 2006, serving in roles of increasing responsibility, most recently as President for Crestliner Boats in Otsego, Minnesota from April 2013 to April 2016 and as Vice President, Brunswick Financial Services Corporation in Mettawa, Illinois from April 2016 to present.
Scott Ward
Vice President and General Manager of Freedom Boat Club Corporate-Owned Territory
Scott Ward
oversees more than 100 corporate-owned locations.  He leads sales, operations, fleet, and member experience for the Club.
Scott has spent his entire career in the marine industry.  Prior to joining Freedom Boat Club in March of 2020, Scott has spent the last 15 years working within the Brunswick Corporation; most recently as the President of Sea Ray Sport Yachts and Yachts.  Prior to that, he led the entities that make up Brunswick Financial Services and was responsible for Brunswick Dealer Advantage.  Before joining Brunswick, he held senior management positions with a large yacht sales organization and a national bank serving marine dealers and manufactures throughout the United States.
Barry Slade
Vice President, Fleet and Franchise Development
Barry Slade
is Vice President of Business Development for Freedom Boat Club and brings a wealth of senior level experience to this position.
He is directly responsible for expanding the Freedom Boat Club franchise network internationally, a task he is well suited to handle after directing and managing global sales and marketing activities for several leading boat brands.
Barry also is point on new marina acquisition initiatives, drawing from previous experience as COO for a marine management company.
Another major responsibility includes serving as liaison to the growing number of marine manufacturers and select vendors as part of Freedom Boat Club’s continued product expansion initiatives.
Barry has worked professionally in the marine industry since 1989 in several executive capacities. In addition, he is an avid boating enthusiast and a major fan of the boat club concept, having been an active boat club member prior to joining the Freedom Boat Club team.
Nicholas Thomas
Sr. Director of Operations
Nic Thomas
joined the Freedom Boat Club team in November of 2014 and is currently the Director of Club Operations. It's his goal to ensure that every member has their expectations met, all while providing a friendly and welcoming atmosphere.  He works with local club managers, dock staff, instructors and closely with other departments to ensure that every experience anyone has with Freedom Boat Club is met with our high standards.
Before starting with FBC, Nic received his Bachelors and Masters degrees with concentrations in Biology, Political Science and Medical Sciences. He also earned his USCG Captain's License for an OUPV. In his free time, Nic enjoys water skiing, wakeboarding, Scuba diving, surfing, and running marathons. He also loves to hike, mountain bike, and cruise on his motorcycle in the beautiful outdoors.
Randall F. Underwood II
Membership Sales Manager & Membership Executive
Randy Underwood
is Freedom Boat Club’s Corporate Membership Sales Manager. His first and foremost responsibility is to train and support his team of membership executives throughout the Southwest Florida region. He is responsible to provide the tools needed for the sales team to perform their job. He is also intimately involved in creating new systems and programs to facilitate a better experience for the sales team.
Randy is responsible for ongoing sales training for both the internal corporate team, as well as supporting franchise sales groups however needed. Prior to his promotion, Randy served in the trenches as an award-winning corporate membership executive himself, having won the “Membership Executive of the Year” five consecutive years. This hands-on experience working in the field allows Randy to bring a real world perspective to the position.
Martha Wagley
Training Manager
Martha “Marti” Wagley
serves as Training Manager for Freedom Boat Club’s corporate clubs throughout Southwest Florida. In this capacity, Marti is responsible for recruitment and training of 25+ trainers, a job she is well qualified to manage. Marti has been with Freedom Boat Club since 2007 and in her tenure, has trained somewhere in the neighborhood of 1000 members. With a 100-ton US Coast Guard Masters License and years of boating experience under her belt, Marty brings plenty of experience and a boat load of enthusiasm to her job.
On a personal front, Marti is a passionate scuba diver and a PADI certified master diver/instructor who has managed shops and trained divers in exotic ports of call including Maui and several venues throughout the Caribbean.  She’s also a former body builder and motorcycle owner/enthusiast. Her favorite role, however, is spending time with her daughter and grandkids, including the latest family production … her first great grandson!
Barry Slade
Vice President, Fleet and Franchise Development
Barry Slade
is Vice President of Business Development for Freedom Boat Club and brings a wealth of senior level experience to this position.
He is directly responsible for expanding the Freedom Boat Club franchise network internationally, a task he is well suited to handle after directing and managing global sales and marketing activities for several leading boat brands.
Barry also is point on new marina acquisition initiatives, drawing from previous experience as COO for a marine management company.
Another major responsibility includes serving as liaison to the growing number of marine manufacturers and select vendors as part of Freedom Boat Club’s continued product expansion initiatives.
Barry has worked professionally in the marine industry since 1989 in several executive capacities. In addition, he is an avid boating enthusiast and a major fan of the boat club concept, having been an active boat club member prior to joining the Freedom Boat Club team.
